languages.text: "Казначей, подъемник — кто еще виноват, губернатор? Вы правитель этого мира или случайный прохожий? Немедленно примите меры по восстановлению порядка, пока я не решил, что вы намеренно или по непригодности саботируете визит Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "А также уровень безопасности в крепости — критически низкий. Халатность стражи — вопиющая. Казнь проводится не по форме. Все это не сыграет в вашу пользу, господин губернатор". {n}Безапеляционно констатирует проктор, пока Руолдо пытается мычать оправдания в ответ.{/n}

languages.text: "The treasurer, the elevator — who are you going to blame next, Governor? Are you the ruler of this world or a casual onlooker? You will take measures immediately and restore order, or I will conclude that you are sabotaging the Rogue Trader's visit, either by intent or simply due to your own ineptness."
languages.original_text: "Казначей, подъемник — кто еще виноват, губернатор? Вы правитель этого мира или случайный прохожий? Немедленно примите меры по восстановлению порядка, пока я не решил, что вы намеренно или по непригодности саботируете визит Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "The treasurer, the elevator — who are you going to blame next, Governor? Are you the ruler of this world or a casual onlooker? You will take measures immediately and restore order, or I will conclude that you are sabotaging the Rogue Trader's visit, either by intent or purely due of your own ineptness."

"The treasurer, the elevator — who are you going to blame next, Governor? Are you the ruler of this world or a casual onlooker? You will take measures immediately and restore order, or I will conclude that you are sabotaging the Rogue Trader's visit, either by intent or simply due to your own ineptness."

"The level of security in the fortress is critically low. The negligence of the guards is flagrant. Executions are being carried out improperly. You are digging yourself deeper by the minute, Lord Governor."

"The treasurer, the elevator — who are you going to blame next, Governor? Are you the ruler of this world or a casual onlooker? You will take measures immediately and restore order, or I will conclude that you are sabotaging the Rogue Trader's visit, either by intent or simply due to your own ineptness."

"The treasurer, the elevator — who are you going to blame next, Governor? Are you the ruler of this world or a casual onlooker? You will take measures immediately and restore order, or I will conclude that you are sabotaging the Rogue Trader's visit, either by intent or simply due to your own ineptness."

"The treasurer, the elevator — who are you going to blame next, Governor? Are you the ruler of this world or a casual onlooker? You will take measures immediately and restore order, or I will conclude that you are sabotaging the Rogue Trader's visit, either by intent or purely due of your own ineptness."

"The treasurer, the elevator — who are you going to blame next, Governor? Are you the ruler of this world or a casual onlooker? You will take measures immediately and restore order, or I will conclude that you are sabotaging the Rogue Trader's visit, either by intent or simply due to your own ineptness."

languages.text: “先是财务大臣出了问题，然后是电梯出了问题，你接下来又要说什么出问题了，总督？你到底是这个世界的统治者，还是个置身事外的看客？你必须想办法立刻恢复秩序，否则我就会认为你在破坏行商浪人的来访，或者是蓄意破坏，或者纯粹是由于你的无能。”
languages.original_text: "The treasurer, the elevator — who are you going to blame next, Governor? Are you the ruler of this world or a casual onlooker? You will take measures immediately and restore order, or I will conclude that you are sabotaging the Rogue Trader's visit, either by intent or simply due to your own ineptness."

traits.locale_text: “先是财务大臣出了问题，然后是电梯出了问题，你接下来又要说什么出问题了，总督？你到底是这个世界的统治者，还是个置身事外的看客？你必须想办法立刻恢复秩序，否则我就会认为你在破坏行商浪人的来访，或者是蓄意破坏，或者纯粹是由于你的无能。”

languages.text: «El tesorero, el ascensor... ¿a quién echará la culpa después, gobernador? ¿Es usted el soberano de este mundo, o un simple espectador? Tomará medidas inmediatas para restablecer el orden, o entenderé que está boicoteando la visita {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente ya sea de manera deliberada o simplemente por pura ineptitud».
languages.original_text: "The treasurer, the elevator — who are you going to blame next, Governor? Are you the ruler of this world or a casual onlooker? You will take measures immediately and restore order, or I will conclude that you are sabotaging the Rogue Trader's visit, either by intent or simply due to your own ineptness."

traits.locale_text: «El tesorero, el ascensor... ¿a quién echará la culpa después, gobernador? ¿Es usted el soberano de este mundo, o un simple espectador? Tomará medidas inmediatas para restablecer el orden, o entenderé que está boicoteando la visita {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente ya sea de manera deliberada o simplemente por pura ineptitud».

languages.text: "Hazinedar, asansör... Şimdi kimi suçlayacaksın Vali Bey? Bu dünyanın hükümdarı mısın yoksa sıradan bir seyirci mi? Derhâl önlem alıp düzeni yeniden sağlayacaksın yoksa Hür Tacir'in ziyaretini ya kasten ya da sadece kendi beceriksizliğin yüzünden sabote ettiğin sonucuna varacağım."
languages.original_text: "The treasurer, the elevator — who are you going to blame next, Governor? Are you the ruler of this world or a casual onlooker? You will take measures immediately and restore order, or I will conclude that you are sabotaging the Rogue Trader's visit, either by intent or simply due to your own ineptness."

traits.locale_text: "Hazinedar, asansör... Şimdi kimi suçlayacaksın Vali Bey? Bu dünyanın hükümdarı mısın yoksa sıradan bir seyirci mi? Derhâl önlem alıp düzeni yeniden sağlayacaksın yoksa Hür Tacir'in ziyaretini ya kasten ya da sadece kendi beceriksizliğin yüzünden sabote ettiğin sonucuna varacağım."

languages.text: 「出納係、エレベーター…総督、次は誰を責めるつもりだ？お前はこの惑星の支配者なのか、それともただの傍観者なのか？すぐに措置を取り、秩序を回復してくれ。さもなければ、意図的かお前の無能さのせいでローグトレーダーの訪問を妨害しようとしていると結論づけることになるからな」
languages.original_text: "The treasurer, the elevator — who are you going to blame next, Governor? Are you the ruler of this world or a casual onlooker? You will take measures immediately and restore order, or I will conclude that you are sabotaging the Rogue Trader's visit, either by intent or simply due to your own ineptness."

traits.locale_text: 「出納係、エレベーター…総督、次は誰を責めるつもりだ？お前はこの惑星の支配者なのか、それともただの傍観者なのか？すぐに措置を取り、秩序を回復してくれ。さもなければ、意図的かお前の無能さのせいでローグトレーダーの訪問を妨害しようとしていると結論づけることになるからな」

languages.text: « Le trésorier, l'ascenseur... À qui d'autre encore allez-vous faire porter la responsabilité de vos manquements, gouverneur ? Vous administrez cette planète ou vous êtes là en simple touriste ? Je vous somme de prendre des mesures séance tenante afin de rétablir l'ordre, faute de quoi j'en conclurai que vous sabotez la visite {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, que ce soit de manière intentionnelle ou par pure incompétence. »
languages.original_text: "The treasurer, the elevator — who are you going to blame next, Governor? Are you the ruler of this world or a casual onlooker? You will take measures immediately and restore order, or I will conclude that you are sabotaging the Rogue Trader's visit, either by intent or simply due to your own ineptness."

traits.locale_text: « Le trésorier, l'ascenseur... À qui d'autre encore allez-vous faire porter la responsabilité de vos manquements, gouverneur ? Vous administrez cette planète ou vous êtes là en simple touriste ? Je vous somme de prendre des mesures séance tenante afin de rétablir l'ordre, faute de quoi j'en conclurai que vous sabotez la visite {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, que ce soit de manière intentionnelle ou par pure incompétence. »

languages.text: "Der Schatzmeister, der Aufzug, wem wollt Ihr als Nächstes die Schuld geben, Gouverneur? Seid Ihr der Herrscher dieser Welt oder nur ein unbeteiligter Schaulustiger? Ihr werdet augenblicklich Maßnahmen ergreifen und die Ordnung wiederherstellen, andernfalls muss ich annehmen, dass Ihr den Besuch {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sabotiert, ob bewusst oder durch totale Unfähigkeit."
languages.original_text: "The treasurer, the elevator — who are you going to blame next, Governor? Are you the ruler of this world or a casual onlooker? You will take measures immediately and restore order, or I will conclude that you are sabotaging the Rogue Trader's visit, either by intent or simply due to your own ineptness."

Ihr werdet augenblicklich Maßnahmen ergreifen und die Ordnung wiederherstellen, andernfalls muss ich annehmen, dass Ihr den Besuch {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sabotiert, ob bewusst oder durch totale Unfähigkeit."
